statements: UPDATE inventory_levels SET quantity = 10, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET item_name = 'New Item', item_code = 'ABC123', quantity = 20 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET quantity = 100, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 5
UPDATE inventory_levels SET item_name = 'Laptop', quantity = 50, location = 'Store B', usage_data = '{"last_update": "2022-09-15", "last_usage": 5}' WHERE id = 10
UPDATE inventory_supplies SET quantity = 20 WHERE supply_id = 101;
UPDATE sensor_data SET usage_count = 50, last_recorded_date = '2022-01-31 14:30:00' WHERE sensor_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory_supplies SET quantity = quantity - 10, last_usage_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE supply_id = 101
UPDATE sensor_data SET usage_count = 50, last_recorded_date = '2022-06-20 09:00:00' WHERE sensor_id = 201
UPDATE inventory_supplies SET quantity = 50, last_updated = '2022-09-15' WHERE supply_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE iot_sensors SET battery_level = 80.5, installation_date = '2022-07-20' WHERE sensor_id = 'a23e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE inventory_supplies SET quantity = quantity + 10, last_updated = NOW() WHERE supply_name = 'Pencils'
UPDATE iot_sensors SET battery_level = 85.5, sensor_location = 'Room B', installation_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
UPDATE medical_supplies SET quantity = 50 WHERE supply_name = 'Bandages';
UPDATE inventory_levels SET quantity_in_stock = 100, last_updated = NOW() WHERE supply_id = 3 AND sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE medical_supplies SET quantity = quantity + 5, location = 'Storage Room' WHERE supply_name = 'Bandages';
UPDATE inventory_levels SET quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock - 10, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE supply_id = 101 AND sensor_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE sensor_data SET value = 35.5, timestamp = '2022-01-15 14:30:00' WHERE sensor_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE sensor_data SET value = value * 1.25 WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
